articles.title: India launches new digital infrastructure initiative

extracted_content.content: The government of India has launched a comprehensive digital infrastructure initiative aimed at connecting rural areas with high-speed internet. The program includes setting up broadband towers, fiber optic cables, and digital literacy centers across 50,000 villages. The initiative is expected to benefit over 100 million rural citizens and create new employment opportunities in the technology sector. This project is part of the broader Digital India program which aims to transform the country into a digitally empowered society.
